content.description: Big moves on crimps up a ~40 degree wall. The higher foot plate/shelf (circled in beta photo) is on.
content.location: On the boulder right below Stairway to Heaven.  Sit start on a large jug on the left arete of the face.  Trend up and right on crimps.

content.description: Sit start right hand in perfect incut crimp and left on large sloper, make a big move up to pinch and then side pull edge. From here use sloper crimps out right and throw for the lip.
content.location: On the opposite side of "An Unexpected Journey" boulder. Cut right early when heading up to the Middle Earth area.

content.description: Rules Problem! Sit start right hand in perfect incut crimp and left on large sloper, make a big move up to pinch and then side pull edge. From here cross right over to left facing slopey ledge. Use more ledges if you wish, to gain an ok pinch you need to hit just right, then hit the lip.
content.location: On the opposite side of "An Unexpected Journey" boulder. Cut right early when heading up to the Middle Earth area.

content.description: Start right hand high on good edge and use side pulls to gain the lip. Be careful on the top out!
content.location: The skinny black tower looking boulder located in the main part of Middle Earth.

content.description: Epic slab on top of "An Unexpected Journey" boulder. Awesome rock all the way up this thing! Many variations exist, but be careful for there is no landing!
content.location: There are two ways to get to it: 1) After topping out "My Precious" traverse out the ledge smearing your way over to the base of the slab (No falls here!) or 2) Use the backside of the "My Precious" boulder to scramble up to the base of the slab from the left.

content.description: Sit start low on the right side of the boulder on two solid jugs. Make a big move up to the large sloper feature and then go out left to a good side pull. Make your way up on small crimps and pockets to the jug horn at the lip, or if you're taller make it easier and just huck for it!
content.location: Located to the right of Isengard.
